text: WBDL (102.9 FM) is a radio station broadcasting an Adult Contemporary format. Licensed to Reedsburg, Wisconsin, United States. The station is owned by Magnum Communications. ==Programming== WBDL features Adult Contemporary music from Dial Global Local, News from Fox News Radio in addition to local sporting events. It previous carried Adult Contemporary Music from ABC Radio ==References== ==External links== * BDL Category:Adult contemporary radio stations in the United States
title: WBDL
